title: The Future of Data: What I Learned from SQL to Vector Databases
summary: This semester, I got into databases and learned a ton. I started with MySQL and SQLite, figuring out how to write queries to manage data. Then, I tried Neo4j and saw how it connects things like a web. I also checked out vector databases and how they help apps find stuff fast. Working on projects and seeing real examples made it clear how data is stored and used in apps today.
author: Muhammad Taha Nasir
